english: Now you've brought trouble upon yourself, Ertuğrul.

text: Hem de öyle bir bela ki...
english: And it was such a calamity...

text: Ben size Torumtay'la Ertuğrul'u canlı istiyorum demedim mi?
english: you I wanted Torumtay and Ertuğrul live?

text: Hülagü Han'ın kudretini çok hafife aldın Ertuğrul.
english: greatly underestimated the power of Hulagu Khan, Ertuğrul.
You thought you could save yourself by killing Alıncak. You collaborated with

text: Ben daha son sözümü demedim Arıkbuka!
english: I haven't said my last word yet, Arikbuka!
Otherwise, it will cause us trouble.
going to take Ertuğrul away from here.
Let's go to the Alps without them chasing us.
-(Sırma) Is there permission, sister? -Come here, Sırma.
I will pack up Beybolat Bey's belongings.

text: Ona ait hiçbir şey istemem bu otağda.
english: I don't want anything of hers in this tent.
I would have the women do it.
It's clear you've tired yourself out quite a bit. I took a

text: Maşallah obaya hatun eli değdiği belli.
english: It's clear that a woman's touch has been felt in this village, Masha Allah.
A different order has arrived. There
is still much work to be done.

text: Hele ki Hayme Ana’nın işaret ettiği hayırlı mesele.
english: Especially the auspicious matter that Hayme Ana pointed out. What do
-What subject are you referring to? -What topic will it be about, sister?
Of course, it's about marriage. With
all the troubles we have on our hands...
...these are n't things to be thinking about, Sırma. It is

text: ...böyle hayırlı meselelerin tehir edilmesi doğru değildir.
english: not right to postpone such beneficial matters with various excuses.
Even though he was a traitor...
...Beybolat Bey's body has not yet been found.

text: Bizim töremizde cenaze evine bayram sinisi girmez.
english: In our tradition, a festive tray is not brought into a funeral home.
What will people say about us behind our backs?
...to patiently wait for the end. Do
n't dismiss it so quickly, sister.

text: Zira zannımca Hayme Ana doğru der.
english: Because I think Hayme Ana is right.
I think you shouldn't think of my brother any differently than that. The time has come to
look to the future, to determine your stature...

text: Elbette hayırlı işlerin tehiri doğru değildir.
english: Of course, delaying good deeds is not right.

text: Lakin bu hususta son sözü Ertuğrul Bey der.
english: However, Ertuğrul Bey will have the final say on this matter.

text: Lakin belli ki Ertuğrul Bey'in töreli bir hatunla...
...senin gibi kutlu bir hatunu otağında görmeyi diler.
english: a blessed woman like you in his tent.

text: (Sırma) Atlatılan badireleri, çekilen ızdırapları en çok o bilir.
english: (Sırma) She knows best the hardships overcome and the suffering endured.

text: Yoksa ahval böyleyken bunca gailenin üstüne...
english: Or, given the circumstances and all these worries...

text: ...neden böyle bir hayırlı iş kelam etsin ki?
english: why would he even mention such a beneficial deed? In short,

text: Sözün özü bir an önce Ertuğrul Bey'le evlenmelisin abla.
english: you should marry Ertuğrul Bey as soon as possible, sister.

text: Zira ağabeyimin ettiği onca oyundan ötürü...
english: Because of all the games my brother played...

text: ...koç başlı otağımıza çalınan bu utanç lekesi...
english: ... this stain of shame that has been cast upon our magnificent tent...
...can only be erased by your marriage.

text: Hatunlara söyle, gelip alsınlar bunları. Hadi.
english: Tell the women to come and pick them up. Come on.
Oh my brothers, what have they done to you!
We'll find him, my friend. We'll find him, we'll find your father.

text: Alpler! Ertuğrul Bey'i arayın. Her yeri arayın hadi!
english: Alps! Call Ertuğrul Bey. Search everywhere!

text: Konuş, de hele. Kim yaptı bunu?
english: Speak up, tell me. Who did this?
Mr. Turgut, where is my father? Is

text: Babam sağ mı? Yaşar mı, bilir misin?
english: my father alive? Do you know if he's alive?
(Gündoğdu) Come on, come on brother, let's make an effort. They were
torture my brother to make him talk .
-Okay, my brave man, we'll find him. -We'll find him...
Search him right now, hurry! Do
n't tire yourself out, brother. We'll make

text: (Bamsı) Artuk Bey'e götüreceğim seni. İyi olacaksın.
english: I'll take you to (Bamsi) Artuk Bey. You'll be alright.
You'll be alright. Don't tire yourself out, brother.

text: Hele bir gel şöyle otur da bir soluklanasın.
english: sit down and take a breather.
...now we'll soon be busy with wedding preparations.

text: Hazırlıkları bir an evvel tamam etmek lazım gelir.
english: Preparations need to be completed as soon as possible.
They say you can get vinegar from a vinegar jar... and honey from a honey jar.

text: İlbilge Hatun töreli bey kızı olduğunu defaten gösterdi.
english: İlbilge Hatun repeatedly demonstrated that she was a noblewoman of noble birth.

text: İmdi bize de buyurduğun gibi sözümüzü tutmak en makbulüdür anam.
english: Now, as you instructed us, keeping our word is the most commendable thing, mother.
From now on, what we have to do is...

text: ...ulu bir düğün toyu kurup, hısım, akrabayı şen etmektir.
english: ...organize a grand wedding celebration and bring joy to our relatives and friends.

text: ...cümle âlem Kayı Obası'nın kılıcının ne denli keskin olduğunu gördü.
english: ...the whole world has seen how sharp the sword of the Kayı tribe is.

text: İmdi Ertuğrul Bey'imin düğün toyuna gelsinler de...
english: Now let them come to Ertuğrul Bey's wedding feast...

text: ...sofrasının da ne denli büyük ne denli bereketli olduğunu görsünler.
english: ...and see how grand and bountiful his table is .
...My dear Gündoğdu Bey and my dear Gündüz...

text: Emmi, yeğen bunca vakittir neden gelmediler dersin?
english: Uncle, why do you think your nephew hasn't come all this time?
Her work isn't finished, my daughter.
We got caught up in conversation. I've completely forgotten
I had put food on the stove. Should I
go and get it before it gets burned?

text: Hadi sen git aşına bak, yanmasın. Hadi kızım.
english: Go and check on your food, don't let it burn. Come on, girl.

text: Arıkbuka, Hülagü’nün Anadolu’daki en has casusudur.
english: Arikbuka was Hulagu's most trusted spy in Anatolia. He

text: İmdiye kadar namını işittiğim en sinsi Moğol odur.
english: is the most cunning Mongol I have ever heard of.
(Gündoğdu) Now listen to me carefully. He will

text: Bildiği her şeyi öğrenmek için Ertuğrul'a her türlü işkenceyi edecektir.
english: inflict every kind of torture on Ertuğrul to make him reveal everything he knows.
My husband absolutely refuses to speak.
Of course Bamsi won't talk, don't worry.

text: Lakin tez kurtarmamız da icap eder.
english: But we need to rescue them quickly.

text: Astarın içindeki saklı olan evrakları buldum.
english: I found the documents hidden inside the lining.

text: İmdi sıra Ertuğrul Bey'i bulmaya geldi.
english: Now it's time to find Ertuğrul Bey.
We won't return to the camp until we find him.
Wherever you go in the world...
...no matter which rat hole you crawl into...
...I will find you, Beybolat. I'll find him and kill him

text: Beyim, Turgut Bey'i götürmek için hazırız.
english: Sir, we are ready to take Mr. Turgut away.
Melikshah, now listen to me carefully.
Let them come and take our martyrs. Let them know that
...and that we will certainly find him.
(Gündoğdu) Everyone in the village will be looking for Ertuğrul.
You will also send word to the other tribes.

text: Her taraf didik didik aranacak. Anlaşıldı mı?
english: Everywhere will be searched thoroughly. Understood?

text: Abdurrahman'a da söyle, Umur Obası'na gitsin.
english: Tell Abdurrahman to go to Umur Obası as well.
Let İlbilge Hatun know that Beybolat is alive. So that he

text: Bilsin ki ona göre tedbirini alsın.
english: knows and can take precautions accordingly. As you
command, Mr. Gündoğdu. Let's begin in the name of God

text: Hele müsaade edesin de Turgut Bey'imi tez götürelim.
english: to take Mr. Turgut away quickly.
(Bamsi) Come on... Come on. Oh God. Come on
Don't deposit (music). Lean your back against the wall.
(Arıkbuka) He will stay like that until he sobers up.

text: Kızıl kan döktükten sonra adamın içini tazeler.
english: After shedding red blood, it refreshes the man's soul. Let it be
...fire will fall upon the Kayı tribe.

text: Beylerini aldık. En mühim Alplerini öldürdük.
english: We captured their leaders. We killed their most important Alpine warriors.
Why did I come here, Albastı?
I greet the enemy with blood.
They respond with screams of terror. The
Ertuğrul is a tough nut to crack, though. Just so

text: Sen Ertuğrul'un topraklarında aklın başından uçtu da...
english: you lost your mind in Ertuğrul's lands,
Albastı... ...and forgotten the past? Don't you know

text: Onun gibi nice zorlu adamları nasıl dile getirdiğimi bilmez misin?
english: how I've brought to life countless challenging men like him ?

text: O dilin altında gizli sandık, Keykavus...
english: Beneath that tongue lies a hidden chest, Keykavus...

text: Berke Han'la yaptıkları gizli anlaşma var.
english: have a secret agreement with Berke Han.
If you know how to dig the earth...
I will dig it up inch by inch. Inch by

text: Sen eştikten sonra hazineni al, gerisini bana bırak.
english: After you dig, take your treasure, and leave the rest to me.

text: Ben intikamımı aldıktan sonra senin eştiğin yere gömeceğim onu.
english: After I get my revenge, I'll bury him where you dug the hole.

text: Buhar olup uçtular mı bunlar beyim?
english: they vanish into thin air, my lord? The

text: Hülagü'nün en usta savaşçıları ve casusları Arıkbuka'nın emrindedir.
english: Hulagu's most skilled warriors and spies are under Arikbuka's command.

text: Belli ki onları takip ettiğimizi anladılar.
english: They obviously realized we were following them.

text: Ne edeceğiz beyim? Nasıl bulacağız babamı?
english: What are we going to do, sir? How will we find my father?

text: Bamsı, sen buraları iyi bellemişsindir. Anlat hele.
english: Bamsi, you must know this area well. Tell me about it.
Melikşah sends word to the tribe...
...the Alps will search the area around the forest.

text: Diğerleri de Semadirek Dağı'yla Papaz Dağı'nı arayacak.
english: Others will be searching for Mount Samothrace and Mount Papaz.

text: Beyim, aha bize de bu vadi kalacak.
english: My lord, this valley will be ours too.

text: Beyim, ikiye çatallaşıp Bizans hududuna varır.
english: My lord, it forks in two and reaches the Byzantine border. The
other one reaches the river, sir. We'll
We will look everywhere in the valley.

text: Gündüz, sen Günkut'la beraber sağ taraftan gideceksin.
english: During the day, you and Günkut will go to the right.

text: Bamsı, sen de Alplerle soldan, benimle geleceksin.
english: Bamsi, you too will come with me from the left, through the Alps.
Our search will continue throughout the night.

text: Er ya da geç Ertuğrul Bey'i bulacağız.
english: We will find Ertuğrul Bey sooner or later.
(All at once) The command is yours, my lord!
We will search with torches. They'll come after us
when they see the flames of the torches .
God willing, sir. Hopefully that will be the case. Maybe we'll get rid of them and

text: Olur da onların canına okuyup kurtarırız beyimizi.

english: Hopefully. Come on! Come on, brave men!

text: Ertuğrul ölse de Gündoğdu kaldığı yerden devam edecektir.
english: Even if Ertuğrul dies, Gündoğdu will continue where he left off. We

text: Başımıza bela kesilmeden evvel onun da icabına bakmak gerek.
english: need to deal with this before it becomes a problem for us.

text: İçindeki Kayı korkusu, bakan gözlerinden, dökülen sözlerinden bellidir.
english: The fear of the Kayı tribe within him is evident in his eyes and the words he speaks.

text: (Arıkbuka) Ben kime ne yapacağımı çoktan kafama kazıdım, merak etme.
english: (Arıkbuka) Don't worry, I've already memorized what I'm going to do to whom .
What are you going to do?
(Arıkbuka) To eradicate the secret dealings they've been conducting...

text: ...Anadolu'da arkamızdan dönen tertibatları kökünden kazımak için...
english: ...and the plots against us in Anatolia... ...

text: Yuvadaki yavru kartallar, büyüyüp kartal olmasın diye...
english: baby eagles in the nest from growing up to be eagles...
...we need to destroy the nest as well.

text: Hülagü Han seni gözden çıkarmış anlaşılan.
english: Hulagu Khan has written you off .

text: Her gelen Moğol, kılıcımdan geçtiği için...
english: Every Mongol who came here was killed by my sword...

text: En sevdiğim düşman, pençemdeyken dahi cesur olandır.
english: favorite enemy is the one who remains brave even when in my clutches. I'm not interested in

text: Zaten öyle hemen çözülenlerle benim işim olmaz.
english: things that are resolved so quickly anyway . It
will give me pleasure to slowly... ...hurtfully... ...break your courage, Ertuğrul.

text: Yine tasmanı tutturacak bir sahip buldun demek Albastı.
english: So you've found another master to keep you on your leash, Albastı.

text: İmdi yine yaralı kuyruğunu kaldırıp havla.
english: Now, lift your wounded tail again and bark.
I'll cut it off at the root anyway. When
my nephew Suleyman was in my hands...

text: Lakin aslan dişlerinin arasında kafasını parçaladığımda...
english: But when I tore his head apart between the lion's teeth ... ...
My heart grows cold whenever I think about it.

text: Ben seni çok çabuk tanıdım Ertuğrul.
english: I recognized you very quickly, Ertuğrul.
good if you got to know me too. When
You can neither escape from here
...give me what I want without resistance.
But they gave you incomplete information. Ah!
Even if all the mountains were yours...
You finally spilled my blood, Ertuğrul!
Now we are truly enemies. It wo
n't end until they've drained all their blood.
...let's chew this thing up so it comes to its senses.
...and you still haven't learned to enjoy it, Albastı.

text: Ağır ağır eziyet çektiğini görmelisin düşmanının.
english: You must watch your enemy slowly suffer.
You must savor it slowly, so that...
...just as we will take words from his tongue...
...his blood will also drain away drop by drop.
(The drums are beating) May it be for
The Alps are the mother. There's
They bring in a wounded person, Grandma. Is he
You should take him to the emergency medical tent immediately.
A fight broke out, Hayme Ana. We
Dumrul and Mergen were also martyred.

text: ...Gündüz Alp de Ertuğrul Bey'imi bulmak için peşinden gitti.
english: ...Gündüz Alp also went after him to find my Ertuğrul Bey.
Lift your head, Melikşah. This is
not the time to bow down. We're at the
How did that traitor do this? Didn't
teamed up with the Mongols and set an ambush.
listen to me for a moment. This is
not the time for crying or complaining.
...our husband has come to our aid.
Now we will run to him!
You will go look for your husband immediately!
The women who stayed in the camp! You will assume
battle formation and arm yourselves with your spears...
... we will fight with everything we have, to the
(All together) We will fight! We will fight! We will fight! Come on

text: Merhem dövesin İlçin Hatun. Yaranın üstünü kapatmamız lazım.
english: Apply the ointment, Ilcin Hatun. We need to cover the wound.
The bleeding is not stopping, Mr. Artuk.
Wipe it again with the cloths you boiled.

text: Kızgın demiri hazır edesin. Yarayı dağlayacağız.
english: Get the hot iron ready. We will cauterize the wound.
How are things, Artuk Bey? Will
We will cauterize the wound, Hayme Hatun. It's

text: Bunu yapan hain, sırf acı çeksin diye kılıcı bilerek hassas yerine saplamıştır.
english: traitor who did this deliberately plunged the sword into a sensitive spot, solely to inflict pain. That
Demir is ready, sir. Please allow us,

text: Sen bize müsaade edesin Hayme Hatun.

english: (Artuk) Now be cautious. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
If it hurts and you try to put it down...

text: ...ya da uykun gelir de başın düşerse...
english: ...or if you get sleepy and your head droops...
...the fork will get stuck in your throat and you'll die.

text: (Arıkbuka) Hoş, böyle beklersen de acıyla kıvranacaksın.
english: (Arıkbuka) Well, if you wait like this, you'll writhe in pain.

text: İmdi ben sana ölümle acı arasında iki seçenek sunarım.
english: Now I offer you two choices between death and suffering.
Speak up and get it over with. What you

text: Korkutmaya çalıştığın her şey bize cesaret verir.
english: try to scare us with only gives us courage. Let
my soul be torn to pieces, if it wants to.
You won't see a trace of pain on my face.
since you couldn't bring me to my knees
But it's not what I wanted to hear.
You will tell me what you received from Alıncak. Your
I fed it to the vultures.
The longer you prolong it, the more you torment yourself.
what kind of business are you running with Berke Khan?
Where does Sultan Keykavus fit into all of this?

text: ...senin akıbetin de peşine düşenler gibi olur.
english: ...your fate will be the same as those who pursue you.
You have a hand in all of this.
I'm going to break those fingers of his... ...one by one.

text: Lakin bütün her şeyi tek başına yapamazsın.
english: But you can't do everything alone. You

text: Arkanda büyük bir güç var senin.
english: have a great power behind you.
What did you do to them? Did you perhaps give away

text: Moğol Devleti'nin hakkı olan altınları Berke Han'a peşkeş mi çektin yoksa?
english: the gold that rightfully belonged to the Mongol Empire to Berke Khan?
Even if I knew about the gold, I wouldn't tell you...

text: Sen de nasıl olsa altınları almak için onu öldürmeye çalışırsın.
english: You'd probably try to kill him to get the gold anyway.
Just like you tried to kill Alıncak.

text: Kulağımı tırmalayan bu kara sözler de ne?
english: What are these dark words that grate on my ears?

text: ...pusudan çıkıp, ona ilk oku attığını söylemeyecek misin?
english: ...wo n't you tell me that you came out of the ambush and fired the first arrow at him? Are you going to deny that you tried to

text: Onu öldürmeye çalıştığını inkâr mı edeceksin Albastı?

english: I did it. I did it so that

text: (Beybolat) Alıncak, onun eline kalmasın diye yaptım.
english: (Beybolat) Alıncak wouldn't fall into his hands. I
did it so he wouldn't reveal our secrets.

text: (Beybolat) Benim yerimde kim olsaydı aynısını yapardı.
english: (Beybolat) Anyone in my place would have done the same thing. If

text: Alıncak imdi dirilse, o dahi beni takdir ederdi.
english: Alıncak were to come back to life now, he too would appreciate me.
If you hadn't killed him and instead...

text: ...düşmana bıraksaydın, o zaman suç işlemiş olurdun.
english: ...left him to the enemy, then you would have committed a crime.

text: Çeliği toz etmek ne kadar zor ise...
english: as it is difficult to grind steel into dust...

text: ...senin dilini çözmek de o kadar zor olacak.
english: ...it will be just as difficult to decipher your tongue.
But I will never run out of strength. And

text: Sen ise kanın tükenene kadar elimde kıvranacaksın.
english: you will writhe in my hands until your blood runs dry.
Welcome, Abdurrahman Alp. What's wrong? It's a
pleasure to see you, İlbilge Hatun.

text: Hayırdır? Mühim bir şey mi var?
english: What's wrong? Is there something important?
...if it is convenient, I would like to meet you in the tent.
come in. I'll listen to you.
Ertuğrul Bey and our Alps have fallen into a trap. Is
Many of our Alpine warriors fell as martyrs. They

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imi de tutsak edip götürmüşler.
english: also captured and took away my brother Ertuğrul.

text: Yaralı hâlde uçurumdan düşüp, nasıl sağ çıkar?
english: falling off a cliff while injured ?
Moreover, they ambushed my Ertuğrul Bey.
Ertuğrul Bey is now in their hands.
What do you say, Abdurrahman Alp? It
They will pay the price for this sooner or later.
Gündoğdu Bey and the Alps are searching.
(Abdurrahman) They will find their tracks sooner or later.
We will stay at your camp for a while.

text: Sonrasında Ertuğrul Bey'imizi bulmak için aramalara katılacağız.
english: After that, we will join the search to find our Ertuğrul Bey. It would be best if no

text: İmdilik obadan kimsenin haberi olmasa iyi olur.
english: one in the village knew about it for now.
I'll increase the precautions too. Oh

text: Allah'ım, sen Ertuğrul Bey'i zalimin şerrinden koru.
english: God, protect Ertuğrul Bey from the evil of the tyrant.
(The wind is blowing) (An owl is hooting)
They saw the Kayi tribe searching in the forest.

text: Ayağıma gelen avı, peşinde koştuğum avdan daha çok severim.
english: prey that comes to me to prey I chase . Should we
go to where they are and surround them? There's

text: Kapanı buraya kuracağız, pusuya da burada yatarız.
english: We'll set the trap here, and we'll lie in ambush here too.

text: Gündoğdu geldikten sonra da başından tutup kıstırırız.
english: Once Gündoğdu arrives, we'll grab him by the head and corner him .
...nor my brother will be your prey. Don't
push yourself too hard, Ertuğrul. If
the fork enters your throat, you will die.
one can find us unless we want them to.

text: Bu sebeple Gündoğdu'yu üzerimize çekmek için iz bırakın.
english: Therefore, leave a trail to draw Gündoğdu's attention.

text: Öyle bir yere bırakın ki kızıl şafak attıktan sonra burada olsunlar.
english: Leave them in a place where they'll be there after the red dawn breaks.
What kind of mark will they leave? It
your older brother finds a piece of you...
...who knows how worried he'll be. He'll come here, as if he's lost his mind,

text: Ölünü ya da dirini bulabilmek için...
english: to find them, dead or alive
What you're about to bring upon yourself...

text: O vakit ona bir işaret bırakalım.
english: Let's leave him a sign then.
Now he must stain it with his blood.

text: Dediğim gibi yapın. Öyle bir yere bırakın ki...
english: Do as I say. Leave them in a place where ...
...they'll be here after the red dawn breaks .

text: İmdi avım ayağıma gelene kadar biraz uyuma vakti.
english: Now it's time to get some sleep until my prey comes to me.

text: Neler olur abla? Her tarafta tedbir aldırırsın.
english: What will happen, sister? You take precautions on all fronts .

text: Abdurrahman ve Kayı Alplerinin gelmesi olağan değildir abla.
english: Abdurrahman and the Kayı Alps to come, sister.

text: Ahval nedir? Müsaadenle ben de bilmek isterim.
english: What is the situation? With your permission, I would like to know as well.

text: Ne olmuş Ertuğrul Bey’e? Kötü bir şey mi olmuştur?
english: What happened to Ertuğrul Bey? Has something bad happened?
Ertuğrul Bey has been taken prisoner.

text: Tüm uç beyliği teyakkuza geçti. Tedbirler bu sebeptendir.
english: All the border principalities were put on alert. These measures are in place for this reason.
